issue.title: [Website] Add Zulip details to the Communication page
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17663](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17663). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Zulip is currently used for real time development/technical discussions among many Arrow developers. We should add the channel and sign-in details to the <https://arrow.apache.org/community/> page. Some guidance around the use of Zulip versus the mailing list would be helpful as well.

 

To sign in, go to [https://ursalabs.zulipchat.com](https://ursalabs.zulipchat.com/) and make an account.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17663?focusedCommentId=17603515) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
Should we consider asking for a rename of the url to something like arrow.zulipchat.com or arrow-dev.zulipchat.com ? 
It seems this should be possible: https://zulip.com/help/change-organization-url
